response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, while also maximizing its value for us. We hope you find this proposal favorable and look forward to discussing the details further. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 950000}
